TEXT.S: Clarence Brookins sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1946, kinhulan nya ga American, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 193 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 86 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 1968 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu Philadelphia 76ers.
